content.description: A command-line tool that analyzes C++ header files and generates reflection metadata.
features: • Single command execution on header files
• No modifications to existing source code
content.tagline: Run once on your headers to add reflection capabilities

commands.output:
✓ Analyzing headers...
✓ Found 1 class: Person
✓ Generating reflection metadata...
✓ Generated person_reflection.hpp
✓ Complete! Your classes now have reflection capabilities.

content.note: That's it! One command generates all reflection code for your entire project.
